00019 #include <machine.h>
00020 #include <scicos_block4.h>
00021 #include <ee.h>
00022 
00023 
00024 extern _t_ecan CanBuf[8];
00025  
00026 
00027 
00028 
00029 static uint8_t txbuffer[8] = { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 };
00030 static uint32_t cantx_id;     /* contain the id for can messages */
00031 static uint8_t n_byte;
00032 
00033 
00034 
00035 void par_getstr(char * str, int par[], int init, int len);
00036 
00037 static void init(scicos_block *block)
00038 {
00039         EE_Can_Dma_Init();
00040         EE_Ecan1_Clk_Init();
00041         EE_Ecan1_TxInit();
00042         cantx_id=block->ipar[0];
00043         n_byte=block->ipar[1];
00044 }
00045 
00046 static void inout(scicos_block *block)
00047 {
00048   int i;
00049   double * DATA = (double *) block->inptr[0];
00050 
00051    for(i=0;i<(int)n_byte;i++) txbuffer[i]=(uint8_t) DATA[i];
00052    
00053    while ( C1TR01CONbits.TXREQ0 ==1){}
00054    
00055    EcanWriteMessage((_t_ecan*)&(CanBuf[0]),cantx_id,n_byte,0,(uint8_t *)&txbuffer);
00056    C1TR01CONbits.TXREQ0 = 1;
00057    
00058  }
00059 
00060 static void end(scicos_block *block)
00061 {
00062   
00063 }
00064 
00065 void rt_CAN_OUTPUT(scicos_block *block,int flag)
00066 {
00067   if (flag==1){          /* set output */
00068     inout(block);
00069   }
00070   else if (flag==5){     /* termination */ 
00071     end(block);
00072   }
00073   else if (flag ==4){    /* initialisation */
00074     init(block);
00075   }
00076 }
